item.title: Forward Missed Calls and SMS to LINE Using IFTTT
item.description: Preparation First, you need to register or log in to IFTTT (ifttt.com) Next, it will recommend an IFTTT example, click X to skip it. Enter LINE in the search bar in the upper left corner. Then select LINE in the Services. Click on Connect and log in to your account. Please log in to the account that will receive the notifications! Then click on the green Confirm button to link the account.
